ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] SPOILER!!! New Instrument found!
ygData.msgSnippet: Um, that s exactly what it means. I think you re thinking of lore items. Lore items often poof when dropped or cannot be picked up. Draelon ... From: Webber,
ygData.messageBody:
Um, that's exactly what it means. I think you're thinking of lore items.
Lore items often poof when dropped or cannot be picked up.

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 11:26 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] SPOILER!!! New Instrument found!


Oh do I ever wish "no drop" meant you couldn't drop it, and not that you
couldn't pick it up again if you did.

Peace
Evulia, who ran all the way across EC and into WC then discovered she'd
dropped her lute at the tunnel entrance. I was amazed to find it still
there when I got back.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 11:22 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] SPOILER!!! New Instrument found!

> WOO HOO
>
> A No Drop Drum...
>
> Guess I know what I'm doing tonight.
>
> Draelon
>

>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
